m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Stock Near High As Toyota Shows 312-Mile Mirai Reprints Is hybrid car pioneer Toyota Motor ( TM ) about to give electric car startup Tesla Motors ( TM ) a run for its money? Toyota’s Mirai hydrogen fuel cell car — an angular midsize sedan expected to sell for $57,500 — will get an EPA-estimated driving range of 312 miles between refuelings, the automaker says. That tops Tesla’s current EPA-rated range of up to 270 miles between rechargings for its Model S plug-in sedan, which starts at $75,000 for the base model.
